bow: your changing body after baby hey guys severe mommy brain here so sorry if this is the most coherent post just wanted to vent little bit and see if not the only one going through some weird body changes year after having baby and am struggling with some issues and not just the typical weight gain and saggy boobs though have those too since having kid have developed an allergy to metal which discovered when put in my earrings again after while and my ears bled and burned only surgical steel for me now it seems and more recently ve become lactose intolerant or rather ve finally admitted it to myself and got dr verification that yeah maybe it not normal to poop your guts out after an ice cream cone wo go into more detail unless pressed but that the gist of it am the only one anybody else have their body go little crazy after the baby before having my dd **loved** spicy food give me the hottest wings the spiciest curry could eat habanero whole and be fine after having her am the biggest wimp plain tabasco sauce lights my face on fire can handle *anything* no more hot wings for me at all also used to love cauliflower after having my dd despise it the smell the taste raw or cooked everything can eat it at all anymore just happy can say the word cauliflower for awhile even the mention or thought of it made me sick ve become sensitive to dairy too post baby it was from decimating my gut bacteria with antibiotics during delivery when my water broke too soon and baby decided to wait couple days before dropping hard cheeses are okay but no ice cream or soft cheese for me unless load up on lactase pills had to learn the painful way too ooh so sorry that really blows have gotten anything that really helps with it yet unfortunately do the pills help relieve it quite bit had that with tomato basil soup used to be my favorite now just the smell of it makes me gag they do help but really have to load up on them to avoid any discomfort afterwards so mostly try to avoid creamy things but an occasional slice of pizza is hard to resist someone recommended fecal transplant to me but that just sounds so gross developed allergies to citrus flowers and dogs grew up around both and my husband has citrus trees he keeps inside in the winter that pretty much kill me when they bloom and my pubic symphysis disfunction hasn gone away still have to sleep with snoogle or won be able to walk my latex allergy was super mild like rash with extended wear kinda mild after pregnancies break out in hives within minutes it sucks fecal transplants sound gross but they re kind of amazing and worth looking into removed couple of my allergies went away and were replaced with new ones it weird also struggle with panic attacks at certain times of my cycle getting my hormone levels retested to see what changed and what needs to be done other than that do notice big difference my body still looks the same was expecting wider hips and bigger boobs but nope guess when you re already wide and big the change is negligible noooooooooooo darn it could handle not having cauliflower but spicy food is my favorite when baby girl had reflux and could eat spicy things died little on the inside after my first seemed to start having mild allergic reactions to different vegetables mostly broccoli although it has happened at all since ve had my second ll add that my first was section and had all the drugs where with the second did wonder if that caused anything after the second lost bunch of weight and my boobs look all wrinkley now never thought about it before but seem kind of allergic to cats now that year out and also have been getting general hay fever which never had before had baby and alas my breasts will never be the same if it makes you feel better mine did that too my boobs are like hairless testicles with oddly shaped nipples that breast pump really messed me up oh weird was allergic to cats now it not as bad but very allergic to dogs which is cruel joke because have two puppies and yeah boobs they re just mess feel ya on that the opposite and all the food hated before like now ve hated peanut butter my whole life took bite of his pb amp and it so good and onions freaking love onions now there few more things too but those are the biggest for me had lot of issues after being on back to back antibiotics not baby related and finally saw doctor that told me to take probiotics daily to build the good bacteria back up ve been taking them for few years now and it helped so much you may have tried this already but just wanted to throw it out there developed really bad eczema on my hands not even months after my son was born every doctor saw kept telling me it because was washing my hands more frequently with newborn however worked with kids before and so was used to washing my hands million times day without any problems so who knows he about to turn and it still ongoing also super sensitive to caffeine ca have any past noon or ll be up all night and alcohol drink limit or toast still hate avocado used to love it but since baby the smell makes me sick my skin is always dry now and my age and sun spots are like hello mama have become so fragile feel off my bed and broke my arm wtf no longer enjoy meat try to force myself to eat it but went from being one of those if it does contain meat is not meal people to this raw carrot and raw apple are an acceptable lunch who ever am my period suck now they used to be very chill just stick tampon and live my life kind of periods now hormonal crazy psycho with cramps and that on appeared within weeks of my son being born still here 18 months later ve tried everything and the thing that keeps it best under control is thick layer of good old petroleum jelly before bed keep telling myself it ll go away when stop breastfeeding get cavities now never had cavity before my first baby now it like filling per dentist visit what did that baby do to my teeth oh man so since my lo was born almost years ago break out in splotchy face rash when drink some wines and beers on tap can not handle ginger at all barftown developed an insatiable craving for onions all the time used to hate them my pubic symphysis is still way out of whack trying so so hard to lose the baby weight eh suppose years post it not that anymore and it just so stubborn sorry mama but we re all here with ya with the crappy body changes with the metal allergy have you noticed if it caused by nickel ve had major nickel allergy my whole life like ve never really been able to wear jewelry unless it was platinum or surgical stainless steel highly allergic to any gold or silver because of the nickel added to the jewelry if wear gold necklace with flower on it ll literally get hives in the shape of the flower also had an earring go through one of my ears and if cook too long with plated pots and pans get hives up to my elbows anyway there are tons of options now for nickel free jewelry anything stainless steel platinum or sterling silver wo have nickel in it or sometimes you ll see allergy free jewelry around at random stores and those usually work too the biggest problem tend to deal with still are the clasps on jewelry are often nickel or the snap on your jeans or buttons on shirts or jackets the one thing ve noticed which is nothing compared to what others have mentioned pre baby could not eat whole lot of chocolate one tiny bar section from hershey chocolate bar would leave me sick to my stomach but now freaking love chocolate some days it like can get enough especially the dark chocolates with sea salt have two stories for you mine and my husband ex wife her first because it much more relevant when she was pregnant with her second child she worked as server in restaurant one of her jobs was to break up romaine lettuce for salads hands were washed but no gloves were worn for this and she began to get red itchy rash on her hands then they started to crack and bleed of course she had to start wearing gloves all the time when that happened but it did seem to help her hands got worse and worse until she had to start her leave early *because of her hands and they stayed that way for months and months and months after extensive allergy testing it was determined that she had developed an allergy to chlorophyll the green pigment present in all green plant parts like lettuce leaves the rash on her hands were healing because she was eating normal amount of chlorophyll in her diet she now has to avoid fruits and vegetables with chlorophyll as well as freshly cut grass and she still has to use steroid creams to keep her hands from flaring up because that type of eczema tends to be sensitive to all sorts of allergens have the same kind of eczema on my hands too but for different reasons had the h1n1 flu two years ago and it did number on my immune system suddenly began to experience allergies never had before and the symptoms were so intense that even doubling up on allergy medications did help now take 4x the normal dose of reactine and prescription antihistamine called atarax just to have *minimal* allergy symptoms in addition to common allergies like dust and pollen developed an allergy to something in the shampoo been using for about year at the time had that flu it took me really long time to figure this out because cutting out one product at time to try to find the culprit did nothing am basically allergic to liquid soap 90 sure that sls is the problem but neither my allergist nor my dermatologist felt that it was necessary to test me which still unhappy about and might push for later because of how limited am to handful of safe products in your case would strongly urge further testing especially if you suspect that nickle may be involved if you have contact allergy to nickle nickle in your diet can also be problem and cause all sorts of problems you might not necessarily connect to something you re eating anything from digestive issues to fatigue this more of mental than physical thing guess but it sure feels physical super sensitive to seeing blood and hearing about injuries as in get sick to my stomach from seeing paper cut now dental assistant and was super involved with surgery for years with no issues also can stand to go into pool or lake ocean it feels gross and dirty even though know care on my teeth are helping at all my mum and grandma had the same issue glad stopping at one my mum had all her teeth removed at 30 now have eczema on my face arms hands and armpits which is nearly
